_description: A Winter Song: All things must die — three 5-line stanzas (aaabb)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Wynter wakeneþ al my carenou þis leues waxeþ
                    bare…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…ant shild vs from hellefor y not whider y shalne hou
                    longe her duelle
